about

I love to build things that bring value to people. I've always been interested in technology. What drives me as a developer is helping people in a tangible way. I am really passionate about making the web accessible to everyone and I also encourage building open-source projects. I enjoy solving complex problems using web technologies.

I'd like to think that I'm helping solve a problem for someone. Myself included.

about me

services

Front End development

I create and deploy web applications and websites using mainly javaScript and reactJS, and nodeJS for managing backend.

Back end development

I access the various databases maintained by the website to make the system work and do what it's supposed to do

app development

I create intuitive and user-friendly cross-platform mobile applications, using mainly Ionic and React-native.
